299391.「キリカ聖堂へ ようこそ。\n 本日は どのような ご用件で……あら？:
Welcome to Kirika Shrine. How may I help you
today?

299392.「あの もしかして……\n 魔物と 戦ったりしましたか？<yesno><clos: Um, did you, by any chance, fight a monster?<yesno><close>

299393.「あなたは 勇敢な方なのですね。\n ですが 僧侶としては\n そのキズついた身:
You are a brave man. But as a priest, I cannot
overlook your damaged body.

299394.「では……森か どこかに行きました？\n 服は汚れて 葉っぱがついているし……\:
So... did you go to the woods or somewhere
else? Your clothes are dirty, you have leaves
on you... you see, you have a cut on you.

299395.「少し じっとしててくださいね……: Please stay still for a moment...

299397.「彼女……サンの回復呪文は よく効くでしょう？\n サンは まだ若いですが 優秀:
Her...San's restorative spells work well,
don't they? San is still young, but she is an
excellent priest.

299398.「日々の修練が お役に立ったのであれば……\n これ以上の よろこびはありません:
If our daily training has been of any help to
you, we could not be more pleased.

299399.「ですが あなたは ケガの治療のために\n キリカ聖堂を訪れたわけでは ないので:
But you didn't come to Kirika Shrine for
treatment of your injuries, did you?

299400.<pc>は 地獄の門を封印するための\n聖具を作ってほしいと 話した。:
<pc> spoke of his desire to have a
sacrament made to seal the Gates of Hell.

299401.「なるほど。\n 守護騎士団の ガーディアンでしたか。: I see. The Guardians of the Guardians.

299403.「そういう職業が あるのです。\n 彼らは 地獄の門と呼ばれる 大きな脅威から\:
There is such a vocation. They work to protect
Astoltia from a great threat called the Gate
of Hell.

299404.「ガーディアンの活動には 我ら\n キリカ修道会も 協力しているのですよ。:
We, the Order of Kirika, are also supporting
the work of the Guardians.

299405.「まあ……！ 不勉強で 申し訳ありません。\n <pc>さんは そのような\n:
Well...! Sorry for my ignorance. <pc>
has such a wonderful vocation!

299406.「地獄の門の 封印の件でしたら\n 聖堂の中にいる シャクナゲという名の女性に\:
If you are interested in the sealing of the
Gate of Hell, please see the woman named
Shakunage in the Shrine.

299407.「私も これで失礼します。\n <pc>さん ガーディアンのお仕事\n がんばっ:
Me too, I'll leave you with this.
<pc> Good luck with your Guardian
work!

299408.「みんな！\n 団長が 帰ってきたよ！: Hey, guys! The Commander is back!

299411.「<pc>は まだ会ったことがなかったな。\n 彼は ダンディオ団長。守護騎士団:
hadn't met you yet. He is Captain Dandio. He is the Commander of the Guardians... and is known as the most powerful
Guardian of all time.

299412.「ただいま戻りました。\n 長い間 留守にしてしまって すみません。: I'm back. Sorry I was gone for so long.

299413.「守護騎士団の支援者である 各国の王への\n 定期報告です。六大陸の国々を 巡る:
This is a periodic report to the kings of the countries that support the Guardians. It's no wonder it takes so long to visit the countries
of the six continents!

299414.「ありがとう……おかげで 各国の王たちに\n これまでと変わらぬ 守護騎士団への:
Thanks to you... the kings of the world have
promised their continued support for the
Guardians.

299415.「地獄の門は アストルティア全土への脅威……。\n 門の監視と封印をになう 守護:
The Gate of Hell is a threat to all of Astoltia, and the kings understand the importance of the Guardians who watch and seal
the gate.

299416.「ところで……プリゼーラ君。\n 僕が不在の間 問題は ありませんでしたか？:
By the way, Mr. Prisera. Did you have any
problems while I was gone?

299417.「はい 大丈夫ですっ！\n ご不在中 何度か 地獄の門は開きましたが\n 魔物の:
Yes, I'm fine! The Gates of Hell have been opened several times during your absence, but we've managed to defeat the monsters without a
hitch!

299418.「僕が 定期報告を 済ませることができたのは\n 留守を あずかってくれた\n:
I am able to complete my regular report thanks
to all of you who took care of me in my
absence. Thank you.

299419.「これは おみやげです。\n みんなで 分けてください。:
This is a souvenir. Please share it with
everyone.

299420.「これは……ドルワーム名物\n 『銘菓 砂漠の月』！\n プリゼーラ これ 大好:
This... is Dolworm's specialty, "Moon Desert
Dessert"! Prisera, I love this...

299421.「やあ <pc>君。どうやら\n ガーディアンに なってくれたようですね。:
Hey <pc>. It appears that you have
become a Guardian.

299422.「ほら……僕ですよ。入団の儀式のときに\n 博愛の碑で 会ったでしょう？:
You see...it's me. You met me at the Love
Statues during the initiation ceremony.

299423.「僕は 定期報告の途中で たまたま\n 立ち寄ったのですが 君に会えたおかげで\:
I just happened to drop by on my way to the
regular report, but thanks to meeting you, I
had an unexpectedly pleasant time.

299424.「<pc>さんは 地獄の門の魔物とも\n いい戦いをしていましたよ！\n 期待の:
<pc> had a good fight with the
monsters at the Gate of Hell! He's a rising
star with a lot of promise!

299425.「ふん！ 魔物を倒すだけなら\n ここにいる誰でも できますよ。: Hmph! Anyone here can defeat a monster.

299426.「ははは……守護騎士団に またひとり\n 頼もしい仲間が増えて うれしいです。\:
Ha ha ha...I'm glad to see another reliable
companion in the Guardians. ...Yes!

299427.「<pc>君。\n 今から 君の入団式を おこないませんか？<yesno><cl:
<pc>. Now, would you like me to
perform your initiation ceremony?<yesno><close>

299428.「まあまあ そう言わずに……。\n これも 守護騎士団の 伝統なんですよ。\n:
Well, well, well... it's a tradition of the
Guardians. It won't take long.

299431.「我ら ガーディアン\n アストルティアを守護せし 牙持つ盾！\n 守るために戦:
We are the Guardians of Astralia, Shields with
Fangs! We are knights who fight to protect!

299432.「我らが牙 己のため 振るうべからず！\n 悪のみを討ち 罪なき民を守る 正義の:
Our fangs shall not be wielded for ourselves!
We are shields of justice that strike down
only evil and protect the innocent!

299433.「<pc>！\n 汝の牙 正義のために研ぎ\n 捧げると ここに誓え！:
<pc>! Thy fangs, sharpened and
dedicated to justice, I hereby swear!

299434.「よろしい！ 守護騎士団は\n ガーディアン <pc>の入団を認める！:
Very well! The Guardians admit the Guardian
<pc> into their ranks!

299435.「……期待していますよ <pc>君。\n これから 一緒に がんばりましょうね。:
...I have high expectations for you
<pc>. Let's work hard together from
now on.

299436.「それでは <pc>さん！\n 入団式も終わりましたし\n 今回の報酬を 受け取:
Well then, <pc>! Now that the
induction ceremony is over, please receive
your rewards!

299437.「守護騎士団では 任務が色々あります！\n <pc>さんのこと 頼りにしてますし:
We have a lot of duties here at the Guard!
We're counting on you, <pc>, and you
can count on Prisera and the rest of us!
